venue: Vizag-Vizianagaram Road-NH-43, Denkada, Jonnada, Andhra Pradesh 535005
description: A national innovation and technology summit with the theme 'Innovation for Rural Empowerment & Sustainable Technology'. The event spans three days, featuring a 48-hour hackathon (National Hacktriad 2.0), various innovation events, cultural events, and emerging-tech talks by industry experts. It aims to provide problem statements from top industry experts and offers internship opportunities for winners.
registration_fee:
Varies by event:
- National Hacktriad 2.0: ₹750/- per head (includes food and accommodation)
- Other sub-events (Mech EL-Ctronics, Startup Ideathon, Rural Innovation Challenge): ₹499/- per head (students can participate in any two events)
- Spot Events (Debugging Contest): ₹100/- per head
- Cultural Events: Free
prizes: Total Cash Prize: ₹4 Lakhs. For HACKTRIAD 2.0: 1st Prize: ₹1,00,000/-, 2nd Prize: ₹50,000/-, 3rd Prize: ₹25,000/-. Internship opportunities in industry for winners.
topics: Innovation for Rural Empowerment & Sustainable Technology (Overall Theme)
Startup Ideathon (Poster Presentation, Startup Pitch Event)
Rural Innovation Challenge (App for Rural Empowerment)
Hacktriad 2.0 - Day 2: Idea Pitching & Prototype Development
target_audience: Students, innovators, and possibly industry professionals interested in technology, innovation, rural empowerment, and sustainable development.
additional_info: Organized by Lendi Institute of Engineering & Technology, an Autonomous Institution, accredited by NAAC A+ and NBA. Supported by Institution's Innovation Council, Ministry of Education's Innovation Cell, and IEEE Vizianagaram Sub Section. The institution celebrates 18 years of excellence. Problem statements will be provided by top industry experts. Website for more details & registrations: https://lendinit.lendi.edu.in/
raw_text: Lendi An Autonomous Institution Institute of Engineering & Technology NAAC A+ NBA National Board of Accreditation Institution's Innovation Council Ministry of Education's Innovation Cell Government of India IEEE Vizianagaram Sub Section 18 Years of Excellence LNIT SUMMIT - 2K26 Lendi National Innovation & Technology Summit - 2K26 Feb 26th, 27th & 28th 2026 Theme: Innovation for Rural Empowerment & Sustainable Technology NATIONAL HACKTRIAD 2.0 48 Hours Hackathon ₹750/- Per Head Food and accommodation free Mech EL-Ctronics Innovation Expo Startup Ideathon Poster Presentation Startup Pitch Event Rural Innovation Challenge App for Rural Empowerment Spot Events Debugging Contest ₹100/- per Head Cultural Events Free Emerging-Tech Talks By Industry experts ₹499/- Per Head.
